00044 class GUI_EXPORT QgsComposerView: public QGraphicsView

00049 
00051     enum Tool
00052     {
00053       Select = 0,      // Select/Move item
00054       AddArrow,         //add arrow
00055       AddMap,          // add new map
00056       AddLegend, // add vector legend
00057       AddLabel,        // add label
00058       AddScalebar,     // add scalebar
00059       AddPicture,       // add raster/vector picture
00060       AddShape, //add shape item (ellipse, rectangle, triangle)
00061       AddTable, //add attribute table
00062       MoveItemContent //move content of item (e.g. content of map)
00063     };
